column17:
Boss Orange Sunset Eau de Toilette - 75 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.3061

A woman who is the essence and embodiment of joy you can never take your eyes off of her. Cheeks flushed with a cantaloupe warmth and her hair radiating a flaxen tinge out of being in the sun all day; Boss Orange Sunset is a concoction for this dazzling maid. The esteemed house of Hugo Boss brings you a captivating Eau De Toilette that is an aromatic incandescence.

When the top note entangles the lively notes of mandarin orange along with the sweet citrus of bergamot she has captured your senses from that first whiff. As she trails along the heart of this fragrance continues to tease you with a passionate yet delicate feel caused by the heady feminine scent of rose along with a lighter hint of white flowers. Finally the base note cements her position in your heart with warm and sensual notes of sandalwood that are doused with the rich and creamy extracts of vanilla. Perfumed with the aromatic bounty of nature she traipses ahead with an airy and nonchalant demeanour. Long and patterned the glass vial that this luxury fragrance comes in is topped with an elegant stopper. Resonating the wonderful orange palette of the setting sun the peach-orange shade descends to a deep orange-red hue. With her around you never have to travel all the way to the countryside to appreciate the radiant glory of vesper.

column17:
Boss Femme Eau de Parfum - 75 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2990

The name Hugo Boss has always been synonymous with high street fashion for the discerning fashionista and with Femme Hugo Boss delivers no less. This luxury Eau de Perfume perfectly captures the essence of the modern woman - sophisticated sensual and enticingly feminine.

Thanks to a high concentration of alcohol the fragrance lingers on you for a long period of time soothing and revitalising you at the same time. The alluring scent of Femme originates in the top note of luscious tangerine and seductive blackcurrant and moves on to a rich fusion of floral essences created by the delicate trio of stephanotis oriental lily and Bulgarian rose. Artistically blended with a warm base note of silken and musky creaminess Femme creates an aura of liberating femininity both seductive and refreshing at the same time. With Hugo Boss Femme it's time to get noticed.

column17:
Boss Orange Woman Eau de Toilette - 75 ml Price: Rs.3220

Visualize an orange sunset with a mild breeze carrying across the sweet fragrance of fresh floral blooms. The Boss Orange Woman converts this summery visual to a delightful olfactory experience with its soft serene fragrance. Designed for the unconventionally beautiful woman the Orange Woman from Hugo Boss is a luxury Eau de Parfum that connects with your inner femininity and brings out the sensuous woman in you. Enchantingly seductive and mysteriously irresistible the Boss Orange Woman presents a delicate yet playful treat to your senses with its elegant assortment of aromas. Packaged in a slender sophisticated flacon the luxury fragrance opens on a surprisingly fresh note of Sweet Apple. The heart of the fragrance carries the essence of White Flower while the base note comprises the warm aromas of Sandalwood and Vanilla encompassing your breath in an embrace of sweetness and harmony. Sophisticated and full of temptation this gentle aroma is a must-have for all wardrobes.
